holidays.title: National Junk Food Day
holidays.description: Have you ever wished for a day where you can eat absolutely anything you want?

holidays.title: Asalha Puja
holidays.description: Asalha Puja commemorates Buddha's first sermon after enlightenment.

holidays.title: Belgium Independence Day
holidays.description: Don’t miss out on celebrating the commemoration of the Independence of Belgium.

holidays.title: Comic Con
holidays.description: Get your costumes ready and explore the world of superheroes and villains!

holidays.title: Guam Liberation Day
holidays.description: It’s Guam Liberation Day and here’s how you can join in the celebrations.

holidays.title: Invite an Alien to Live with You Day
holidays.description: Invite An Alien To Live With You Day celebrates the hit TV show “Mork & Mindy.”

holidays.title: Lake Superior Day
holidays.description: Get together to celebrate and appreciate Lake Superior and learn a little more about it.

holidays.title: Legal Drinking Age Day
holidays.description: Do you remember the first time that you legally enjoyed a drink?

holidays.title: National Be Someone Day
holidays.description: It only takes about 10 seconds to save or change a child’s life.

holidays.title: National Craft for your Local Shelters Day
holidays.description: Let’s create some homemade pet toys and supplies and donate them to your local animal shelter!

holidays.title: National Day of Prayer Reflection and Thanksgiving in Montserrat
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about how one natural disaster changed an entire nation.

holidays.title: National Lamington Day
holidays.description: Join us as we get ready to celebrate all things buttery, chocolatey, and coconutty!

holidays.title: No Pet Store Puppies Day
holidays.description: Join us as we educate friends and family about what goes on in puppy mills.

holidays.title: Racial Harmony Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Racial Harmony Day, which recognizes the country's progress toward becoming a racially peaceful society.

holidays.title: Take a Monkey to Lunch Day
holidays.description: Take a Monkey to Lunch Day is the perfect day to celebrate our favorite primates.

holidays.title: Robin Williams’s Birthday
holidays.description: We pay homage to the dazzling Hollywood star who remains in our hearts.

holidays.title: Romeo Santos’s Birthday
holidays.description: For Santos, it is not unusual to make history! Let’s celebrate him today.

holidays.title: Vicky Terrazas’s Birthday
holidays.description: This talented singer and songwriter has achieved everything that was in her book.
